	EVENT gotrain (towardsbridge, traindeployed)
	BEGIN
		0
	END

	388 TRIGGER traindead
	389

	EVENT DAMAGE (flipping, trainwreck)
BEGIN

	END

	EVENT DAMAGE (flipping, -)

STATE overbridge
	EVENT killed_supports1 (flipping, trainwreck)
	EVENT DAMAGE (flipping, trainwreck)
BEGIN

79

ENDOBJECT

OBJECT supports1
	STATE undamaged
	EVENT killed_supports1 (destroyed,-)
		BEGIN
			0
		END

	STATE destroyed
		BEGIN
			1
		END

DAMAGETRIGGERS	1

ENDOBJECT

OBJECT	top1
	
	STATE undamaged
	EVENT killed_supports1 (destroyedtop, -)
		BEGIN
			0
		END

	STATE destroyedtop
		BEGIN
			1
		END

ENDOBJECT
